text: Ara yara allahâ€Œra prati o tamra rasulera prati imana eneche, tara'i khoda satyaparayana ebam tadera prabhura samakse saksyadata. Tadera jan'ya rayeche tadera pratidana o tadera aloka. Paksantare yara abisbasa kare o amadera nirdesabali pratyakhyana kare, tara'i hacche bhayankara agunera basinda.
